overview: Maryam Firooz, sister of Nusrat Al-Dawlah Firooz and daughter of Abdolhossein Farmanfarma (grandson of Abbas Mirza, ruler, minister and prime minister of the famous Qajar period and one of the richest people in Iran) has lived a tumultuous life in his private life and social life. And the landings are in his own language at the age of 95.
title: Daughter of Farmanfarma
